Nintendo is slightly mixing up its box art game for the Switch 2 generation with red cases and artwork that now wraps around the spine of the case. Compared to the transparent Switch case, the Switch 2 case is now red on the inside. pic.twitter.com/OA8ajFqmuW May 17, 2025

As you can see, the game manual holder returns in Switch 2 game cases and the game card holder is once again located at the bottom of the case.
